name: XDrops - Color Matching with a Twist!
name_original: XDrops - Color Matching with a Twist!
description:
It’s all about spinning!

XDrops it’s a simple and fun game where you have to match at least 3 Droplets of the same color and reach a high score in the specified amount of movements. It is a high-quality game for entertainment and killing time.

• Tasty graphics will leave you hungry for more
• Helpful boosters that help you achieve a higher score
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
• Leaderboards to watch your personal scores and the competitors

Play a captivating game of spinning and matching colors. Match droplets by rotating an XDrops (a group of 4 droplets). Form groups of three or more droplets of the same color, in a line or in a square, to collect them. The more Droplets you match in a line, the bigger the score you obtain.

Download and play now!

FEATURES
- intuitive interface
- 10 different achievements each with 5 levels
- daily/monthly/all time Personal Leaderboards and a Global Leaderboard

BOOSTERS
The droplets are your kryptonite! Each collected droplet is added to your Water Tank and you can use them to get boosters. Boosters will help you to achieve a higher score and advance higher in the Leaderboards!
- Extra Moves: You’re very close to reach a new high score? Use your super power to add 5 extra moves and continue collecting more Droplets. You can use this booster once per a game. Or twice, if you activate the Water Collector.
- Drop a Drop: Remove a Droplet that may help you match more than 3 Droplets and get extra points. You can use this Booster as many times as you want.
- Drop some Drops: Remove all Droplets of a specific color. You can use this Booster once per a game. Or twice, if you activate the Water Collector.
- Spin the Wheel: Collect 200 Droplets to activate this helpful Booster! All XDrops will be rotated randomly to match at least 9 droplets. This is a FREE Booster, it doesn’t cost you a move, to use it. It will replenish faster, if you activate the Water Collector.
- Water collector: add 1 additional usage per game for Extra moves and Drop some Drops. Plus: Spin the Wheel replenish 10% faster. Activate the Water Collector for a lifetime with only 1.99 Euro.

TIPS
- Access the game each 10 minutes to collect a FREE GIFT!
- Keep an eye on your remaining moves and use Extra Moves, so you have a chance to reach Higher Score
- Connect 4 Droplets in a line, to destroy the whole line / column!
- Connect 5 Droplets in a line, to destroy a whole line AND column!
- Connect 6 Droplets in a line, to destroy TWO whole lines AND columns!
- Connect 4 Droplets in a square, to destroy the droplets from its diagonals!
- Keep an eye on your achievements and collect your prizes from the completed ones!

SUPPORT AND FEEDBACK
If you have any technical problems, please email us directly at XDrops@lateral-inc.com. Please, don’t leave support problems in our comments – we don’t check those regularly and it will take longer to fix any issues that you might encounter. Thank you for your understanding!
